script:
if not exist "C:\Space\" mkdir "c:\Space\"
if not exist "C:\Space\!My Files" mkdir "c:\Space\!My Files\"
rmdir "C:\Space\Legacy Files" /S /Q
rmdir "C:\Space\Scripts\NEW PRODUCTS & 2B" /S /Q
rmdir "C:\Space\Data" /S /Q

robocopy "G:\Space Management Refresh\Space\Images" C:\Space\Images /COPY:DT /W:15 /R:10 /S /XO
@echo off

pause
exit
